DOC.detailed_description: Covert atrial fibrillation ( AF ) relevant potential cause recently propose clinical construct , `` Embolic Stroke Undetermined Source ( ESUS ) '' . However , routine post-stroke work include 24-hour Holter monitoring may fail detect paroxysmal AF . A recent systematic review show increased AF detection rate longer monitoring duration . The aim study evaluate effectiveness novel ambulatory 7-day Holter ECG ( EV-201 , Parama-Tech inc. ) detect AF patient recent ESUS completion standard clinical examination .
